'''Alexander Cameron''' was an occasional member of the [[Notion Club]].

== History ==
Alexander Cameron was educated at Exeter and became a modern historian, especially interested in [[wikipedia:Spanish history|Spanish]] and [[wikipedia:South American history|South American]] history. His interests included collecting coins and stamps and playing a pianola.

Other members do not seem to remember his being invited to join the Club, and he never signed the Club's records as was the habit among the other members.<ref name="List">{{SD|2b}}, p. 160</ref>
